mapper.sql: id, printtype, messagemsg, orderno, username, tableno, timemsg, customerprinterip, customerprinterport, tableArea, tableid,orderseq
mapper.update:
update t_printobj
id=#{id},
printtype=#{printtype},
messagemsg=#{messagemsg},
orderno=#{orderno},
username=#{username},
tableno=#{tableno},
timemsg=#{timemsg},
printnum=#{printnum},
status=#{status},
customerprinterip=#{customerprinterip},
customerprinterport=#{customerprinterport},
tableArea=#{tableArea},
tableid=#{tableid},
orderseq=#{orderseq},
where id =#{id}
update t_printobj set orderno=#{sourceOrderid}, username=#{username}, tableno=#{tableno}, tableArea=#{tableArea}, tableid=#{tableid} where orderno = #{targetOrderid}

update t_printdish
printobjid=#{printobjid},
dishname=#{dishName},
dishnum=#{dishNum},
dishprice=#{dishPrice},
totalamount=#{totalAmount},
payamount=#{payAmount},
sperequire=#{sperequire},
tableNomsg=#{tableNomsg},
maxDishCount=#{maxDishCount},
printipaddress=#{printipaddress},
printport=#{printport},
relatedishid=#{relatedishid},
orderseq = #{orderseq},
printnum = #{printnum},
where primarykey=#{primarykey}
mapper.select:
select
from t_printdish
printobjid=#{printobjid} and dishtype = 1

select
from t_printdish where printobjid=#{printobjid} and dishtype = 3

select
from t_printdish where printobjid=#{printobjid} and ( dishtype not in ('1','2','3') or dishtype is null)

select
from t_printobj where orderno=#{orderno} limit 1
select distinct c.ipaddress printipaddress , c.port printport from t_printer_detail b,t_printer c where dishid=#{dishid} and b.printerid=c.printerid
mapper.insert: insert into t_printdish (printdishid, printobjid, dishname, dishnum, dishprice, totalamount, payamount, sperequire, tableNomsg, maxDishCount, dishUnit, printipaddress, printport, printnum, dishid, printtype, orderseq, relatedishid, dishtype, printerId,ordertype,parentkey,superkey,ismaster,primarykey,islatecooke) values (#{printdishid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{printobjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dishNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dishPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sperequire,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableNomsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxDishCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dishUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{printipaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{printport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},0, #{dishId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{printtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderseq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{relatedishid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dishtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{printerId,jdbcType=VARBINARY}, #{ordertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{superkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ismaster,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{primarykey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{islatecooke,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_printdish set dishnum=#{dishnum} where dishid=#{dishid} and printobjid=#{printobjid} and primarykey=#{primarykey}
delete from t_printdish where primarykey = #{primarykey} or parentkey = #{primarykey}
update t_printdish set islatecooke = '0' where (primarykey = #{primarykey} or parentkey = #{primarykey} ) and printobjid = #{printobjid}
update t_order_detail set islatecooke = '0' where (primarykey = #{primarykey} or parentkey = #{primarykey} ) and orderid = #{orderid}
update t_printdish set printobjid = (select id from t_printobj where orderno =#{sourceOrderid}) where printobjid = (select id from t_printobj where orderno = #{targetOrderid});
mapper.insert:
insert into t_printdish (printdishid, printobjid, dishname, dishnum, dishprice, totalamount, payamount, sperequire, tableNomsg, maxDishCount, dishUnit, printipaddress, printport, printnum, dishid, printtype, orderseq, relatedishid, dishtype, printerId,ordertype,parentkey,superkey,ismaster,primarykey,islatecooke) values
( tableseqno(#{item.printdishid}), #{item.printobjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dishNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dishPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.sperequire,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tableNomsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.maxDishCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.dishUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.printipaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.printport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},0, #{item.dishId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.printtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orderseq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.relatedishid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dishtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.printerId,jdbcType=VARBINARY}, #{item.ordertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.parentkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.superkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ismaster,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.primarykey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.islatecooke,jdbcType=INTEGER})
